title: Slot Five
description: Drag the Maelstrom Vacuum out of your Backpack and onto slot 5 of your Action Bar.
objective: Drag the Maelstrom Vacuum onto <font color='#FF7F00'>slot 5</font> of your <font color='#FF7F00'>Action Bar</font>. Then press <font color='#FF7F00'>5</font> to activate the Vacuum.
